name: Fariha Nizam
careerObjective: I believe my creative and entrepreneurial skills can make a valuable contribution to my employer. I am also motivated to extend my own professional development.
executiveProfile: I am a well-qualified, experienced, highly proficient, visionary, focused, business-savvy, productive, multi-task oriented, organized, performance-driven, analytical, and result-oriented professional.
workExperience: Worked in Zoad International Company's Procurement Department as ‘Procurement Officer’.
Proven work experience as Procurement Officer.
Discover profitable suppliers and use fruitful sourcing strategies.
Collaborate with key personnel to ensure clarity of specifications and expectations.
Negotiate with external vendors to secure advantageous terms.
Finalize purchase details of orders and deliveries.
Foresee alterations in the comparative negotiation ability of suppliers and clients.
Prepare control strategies to manage unfavorable events through data analysis.
Control spend and build a culture of long-term savings on procurement costs.
Track and report key functional metrics to reduce expenses and improve effectiveness.
consultantExperience: Following up on new business opportunities and setting up meetings.
Planning and communicating new product developments to prospective clients.
